site_title: Santa Claus by Steve And Megumi Biddle

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Santa is not delayed by the pandemic! Christmas is the best time of the year. Here is the Origami Santa Claus, or if you would prefer Father Christmas. This origami model of Saint Nicolas is designed by Steve and Megumi Biddle. It's perfect as a Christmas tree ornament or decoration. The model is more of the difficult side. I still hope you will give it a try. Enjoy! Origami Santa Clause timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:22 Pre-creasing the paper 3:23 Diamond Base 4:12 Sink fold 5:49 Folding the basic body shape 9:10 Folding the basic head 9:33 Folding the basic arms 10:37 Folding the legs 12:42 Folding the pants 13:55 Folding the details of the left arm 14:29 Folding the details of the right arm 15:10 Folding Santa's hat and face 16:47 Completed Origami Santa Clause Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
